name: Pixel Runner (Musto69)
description: Pixel Runner is a 2D platformer game where you play as a small pixelated character who must run, jump and avoid obstacles to reach the end of each level. The game features several levels of increasing difficulty, each with different enemies and traps to challenge you. You can collect power-ups to increase your speed or jump height, and unlock additional characters with unique abilities. With retro graphics and an upbeat soundtrack, Pixel Runner is a fun game for all ages.
